scripts.start-dev: export $(grep -v '^#' .env | xargs) && LOG_LEVEL=debug APPLICATIONS_API_KEY=AAA-BBB-CCC PORT=3000 LOG_LEVEL=debug ENV_TEST=SECRET_VALUE_ON__MONITOR nodemon app.js
scripts.test-integration-in-docker: ID=$(docker build -q .) && WORKSPACE=$(pwd) LOCAL_IMAGE_ID=$ID docker-compose -f docker-compose-integration-tests.yml up --force-recreate --abort-on-container-exit --always-recreate-deps --no-log-prefix --quiet-pull --build
scripts.test-unit-in-docker: ID=$(docker build -q .) && WORKSPACE=$(pwd) LOCAL_IMAGE_ID=$ID docker-compose -f docker-compose-unit-tests.yml up --force-recreate --abort-on-container-exit --always-recreate-deps --no-log-prefix --quiet-pull --build
scripts.package-update: git pull && npm run clean & ncu -u && npm install
scripts.package-update-and-test: npm run package-update && npm run test-unit-in-docker-env && npm run test-integration-in-docker-env
scripts.package-update-and-push: npm run package-update-and-test && git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m 'package update' && git push
